recipe.title: Mum's Turkey Stuffing
recipe.subtitle: This stuffing makes enough to fill the cavity of a large chicken or 3.5kg turkey.
recipe.ingredients: 1/2 onion, finely chopped 30g butter 2 cups breadcrumbs 1 apple salt and pepper 1/2 cup sultanas 2 rashers of bacon 1/2 cup chopped herbs from the following: parsley sage thyme dill rosemary chives oregano
recipe.steps: Chop onion and place in a bowl with butter and microwave on high for 3-4 mins. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. If you like, add bacon to the stuffing Remember with poultry its important to have the stuffing and the bird at the same temp.
